text: safety and violence prevention pupil safety private right of action rsa is repealed and reenacted to read as follows private right of action permitted any person aggrieved as a result of gross negligence or willful misconduct in violation of any provision of rsa may initiate an action against a school district or chartered public school and may recover court costs and reasonable attorney s fees as the prevailing party for the purposes of this chapter gross negligence means deliberate indifference nothing in this section shall supercede or replace existing rights or remedies under any other law
